component.name: Lawyer Date Calculator
component.summary: A simple date calculator useful to lawyers

description.p: This is a simple date calculator with just four functions. After entering data, you do not need to click on the "calculate" button. You can just press enter on the keyboard. When entering dates in "mm/dd/yyyy" format, the month and the day can be just one digit, but the year must always be four digits. Therefore, something like "5/3/2023" will work.
